alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 6:34PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Huerfano County through 700 PM MDT... At 632 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southeastern Spring Burn Scar north of Highway 160, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Huerfano County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
